forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally clear skies. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 44F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. SE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SE at less than 5 mph, becoming NW and increasing to 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
